name: Begüm Demir
content: Prof. Dr. Begüm Demir - RSiM Prof. Dr. Begüm Demir Contact: demir [at] tu-berlin.de +49 30 314 23771 Address: Technische Universität Berlin Remote Sensing Image Analysis (RSiM) Group, Sekr. EN 5 Faculty IV Einsteinufer 17 10587 Berlin Room: EN 627 Office Hours: Currently only available via email. Academic Experience 2020-now Full Professor, BIFOLD & Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, TU Berlin, Berlin, Germany. 2022-now Group Lead of Big Data Analytics for Earth Observation, BIFOLD - Berlin Institute for the Foundations of Learning and Data, Germany. 2018-now Founder and Head of the Remote Sensing Image Analysis Group, Faculty of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science, TU Berlin, Berlin, Germany. 2017-2018 Associate Prof, Department of Information Engineering and Computer Science, University of Trento, Trento, Italy. 2013-2017 Assistant Prof, Department of Information Engineering and Computer Science, University of Trento, Trento, Italy. 2010-2013 Post-Doc. Researcher, Remote Sensing Laboratory, Department of Information Engineering and Computer Science, University of Trento, Trento, Italy. 2007–2010 Ph.D, Kocaeli University, Electronics and Telecommunications Engineering, Turkey.
